body.name: Flolinda Queen Bed Frame Upholstered Platform Bed with Headboard Strong 13 Bed Legs, Strong Weight Capacity, No Box Spring Needed, Non-Slip and Noise-Free, Easy Assembly, Black
features: 【Queen Bed Frame With 47.2inch Higher Headboard&10inch Higher Bed Feet】Most of the Upholstered Bed Frames are approximately 5-8 inches in height. We increased the height of this green queen size bed frame feet to 10Inch. Plus the bed side the height up to 15.4inch ! Raised Bed feet leave you more storage space. If you prefer a higher comfortable bed frame queen size, look no further than this!

【Queen Bed Frame With Headboard】Unlike the metal bed frames with No headboard or the others hollow out lighter headboard ours queen size bed frame designed with one pieces heavier and more stable modern higher premium headboard which made of Breathable , skin friendly fabric that Protects your back and head and provides you with a comfortable sitting place. It will make you more happy just sitting in bed reading a book or watching Movie !

【Stable & Durable Queen Size Bed Frame】This bed queen size is fully constructed with Interior steel framework with up to 10 bed feet and28pcs solid thicken wood slats .and the metal crossing board "+" structure center bar with 3 legs support can prevent the bed mattress from sagging and extend the life of your mattress.big heavy headboard Provide Strong support.(800lbs load-bearing capacity)No need to worry it would snapped or collapsed.

【Quiet Camas Queen Better Sleep】There are 2 snap latches for Each wood Slat to prevent slats from moving .Compared with the Velcro design provides you a more stable and quiet sleep environment . 10 bed feet each support feet Design with non-slip mat Protect your floor also ensure no squeaky and shaky when jump in this platform bed frame queen size or roll over when in sleep.

【Easy Assembly Queen Platform Bed Frame】 Each part and each screw is marked with a different numbers or letters allow you easily find the accessories or screws you need and all the tools and instructions are included. Any questions about how to assemble this bed frame queen you can also follow the video or contact us any time!

【Queen Bed Frame No Box Spring Needed】The mattress can be put on the bed frame slats directly, box springs Not needed, you can save more money and time. This upholstered bed frame queen suitable for all kinds of mattresses with 8-12inch Height, spring, memory foam, latex, or hybrid mattress. Stylish & Comfortable Bed Frame Full Size Simple square Pattern upholstered queen bed add sense of fashion and relax to your bedroom.Easily blends with various decoration styles.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: See what other costomers say about this bed frame Superior quality: our bed frame is not lightweight, You can always find ours is more Heavier. If you looking for a more stable&durable king bed frame this is it! Well worth the money! 15.4 higher king bed frame Large Storage Space. Stylish Thicken Tufted Higher One-pieces Headboard.
Breathable&High elasticity backrest Velvet Upholstered Tufted Headboard offers you a comfortable sitting place Thickened premium upholstered headboard

800bl Weigh Capacity Up to 13 Bed feet,42pcs thicken slats More Stable Adjustable Middle Bed Feet Strong support reduces shaking Protect Your Floor Heigher bed feet& Headboard 10inch Higher Bed Feet Plus Bed Side 15.4inch Height, If you prefer a higher bed, this is the One Durable&Noise-free The side and center part is made of widened metal "+" cross sturdy structure making this queen bed frame more durable!
One-piece More Heavy &Stable Headboard No adjustment needed. Compared with the Hollow out Design ours More Stable and it can more effectively prevent the mattress from shifting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This bed frame has been used for a few months now and it's very nice. The headboard is lovely with a velvet-like soft material and the the bed part is pretty sturdy. It is so easy to put together by one person. It takes less than an hour. Great value for the cost.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stellar Purchase: Full-Size Bed for my Son's Bedroom Exceeds Expectations!
reviews.reviewText: I couldn't be more pleased with the product. The bed exceeded my expectations in terms of quality and sturdiness. The assembly was straightforward, and the design perfectly complements my son's room. It's not just a bed; it's a fantastic addition to the overall aesthetics. The delivery was prompt, and the pricing was reasonable for the excellent quality received. Highly recommend this purchase for anyone in need of a reliable and stylish full-size bed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good price, good quality and good style
reviews.reviewText: This is the second King bed frame I have purchased from Amazon this year and I am very happy with the purchase, the bed frame looks solid and of good quality. Although there are many parts that need to be assembled, the instruction manual is very clear, and it is easy to assemble by following the instructions. I browsed many king bed frames on Amazon website, this king size bed frame and headboard look beautiful, headboard seems very comfortable and perfect for my guest room; they are exactly what I was looking for.It's also a very good price for having a bed frame and headboard both. The first King bed frame I bought on Amazon a few months ago was just the King bed frame, no headboard, I had to pay more for the headboard separately to match my bed frame.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars good quality, sturdy, long time to assemble
reviews.reviewText: Gorgeous bed frame, especially from amazon. All of the materials are pretty sturdy and secure. Some reviews say easy to assemble..personal opinion it’s definitely not lol, will take two maybe three people at some point to hold pieces up, has alot of parts and pieces to screw together and you have to pay super careful attention to all the holes and way things face..even if it’s the same part it can still be the wrong one because it does/doesn’t have certain holes & you have to go back and undo all your hard work or you can’t finish (learned the hard way) instructions do have pictures to help but some of the steps and examples become a little vague. moral of the story it’s gonna make you work for it BUT for the price and the quality it’s worth the labor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing bed frame and headboard!
reviews.reviewText: I love this bed frame. It is extremely good quality and looks so beautiful in my bedroom. Although the assembly took my daughter and I several hours to complete, our time was well worth it. I highly recommend this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice, strurdy frame (although, a bit long to assemble)
reviews.reviewText: The frame is nice, the velvet is pleasant to touch. The frame has many parts and assembling it takes a bit longer than I expected, but it makes sense (it is probably not practical to make very long velvet pieces). Plus, the frame has extra support in the middle, making it more sturdy. There was some issue with the frame, but it was quickly resolved after writing to the manufacturer (the email is on the main page of the manual).Btw, at first I couldn't find part Z: it was stuck inside the box and I have found it by accident when I was tearing apart the box to flatten it before trashing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars looks great , easy to assemble , worth money !
reviews.reviewText: my son absolutely love this bed , when I purchased this one. It comes long box , it is not light weight , . After opened box , all peace are included and not damaged . I just follow the instructions, it is easy to assemble it , I spend 1 and half hour on it , not to bad .the upper textures are good , after I done it , it is not flimsy , looks great it . It is good deal for this bed .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Super cute and goes so well with my bedroom. SUPER squeaky though. My downstairs roommate can hear the squeaking/rocking (anytime the bed moves). I’ve tried everything to fix it (tightening the screws, felt pads, WD40) nothing works!! Wouldn’t recommend this. :(
